metadata.name: Mermaid
metadata.description:
After the calm of a raging sea by a strong storm, a beautiful red-haired mermaid appeared.
She emerged from the depths and was washed ashore by the waves to the nearest rocks.
Sitting on a stone at sunset, she embraces herself and keeps her eyes closed, feeling the cold blow of the North wind on her skin while she is awaiting the arrival of the starry night.   


Mermaid is an original handmade terracotta sculpture made by me. 
This image was edited with pictures taken by me.

Original work by Miriam Mora (Anerisart).
